name: Bananas Juggle
description:
Pitch :
Gather fruits to score points. Beat your score. Repeat.
Beware of the bombs, You Only Live Thrice!

Controls :
Move with  left and right arrows
Jump/Start/Confirm with X 

Why? :
This is a simple project to experiment, learn and practice lua, pico8 and game developement. Will maybe update it once in a while.
